vecUnachieved.strDescription: Shock an enemy in the water
Successfully complete the Welcome To Rapture Level
Perform at least one successful hack
Purchase a Plasmid Slot or Tonic Slot in any track
Take at least one Research Photo of a Splicer
Take a Research Photo of the highest grade
Acquire at least one weapon upgrade

data.strFullDescription:
BioShock is a shooter unlike any you've ever played, loaded with weapons and tactics never seen. You'll have a complete arsenal at your disposal from simple revolvers to grenade launchers and chemical throwers, but you'll also be forced to genetically modify your DNA to create an even more deadly weapon: you. 
[h2]Features:[/h2]
[list][*]Museum of Orphaned Concepts
[*]Challenge Rooms
[*]Directorâ€™s Commentary: Imagining BioShock, featuring Ken Levine and Shawn Robertson
[*]Achievements
[*]Full Controller Support
[*]High Resolution Textures, Models and Interface
[*]4K Resolution Support
[/list]
data.strSnippet: BioShock is a shooter unlike any other, loaded with unique weapons and tactics. Complete with an arsenal of revolvers, shotguns, and grenade launchers, players will be forced to genetically modify their DNA to become an even deadlier weapon.
